Class GcRightSidebar

The right sidebar UI control.

Hierarchy

  • GcRightSidebar

Index

Accessors

  • activeState
  • activeTool

Methods

  • collapse
  • expand
  • toggle

Accessors

activeState

  • get activeState(): GcRightSidebarState

  • Returns current right sidebar state. Possible values are: 'collapsed', 'expanded', 'hidden'

    Returns GcRightSidebarState

activeTool

  • get activeTool(): GcRightSidebarTool

  • Returns active tool name.

    Returns GcRightSidebarTool

Methods

collapse

  • collapse(): void

  • Collapse sidebar.

    Returns void

expand

  • expand(): void

  • Expand sidebar.

    Returns void

toggle

  • toggle(): void

  • Toggle sidebar expanded/collapsed state.

    Returns void
